text: haey( yeung ban banhchoun) shou eb towkean kolosampnth mea d yea n del chea bangobaaun robsa puokke . ke ban pol tha ao krom robsakhnhom. chaur puok anak korp sakkar champoh a l laoh choh puok anak kmean mcheasa na phe sa ng pi trong laey . phosdo tang da chbasaleasa pi mcheasa robsa puok anak pit chea ban mokadl puok anak . dau che neah chaur puok anak bampenh kar veasa ning kar thloeng choh haey chaur puok anak kom thveu aoy khveah robsarobr anakadtei aoy saoh . haey chaur puok anak kom braprutte batolmeusa now leu phendei kraoypel del vea mean se th r pheap haey aoy saoh . noh kuchea kar brasaer samreab puok anak brasenbae puok anakchea anak mean chomnue noh
